update main set RJS0 = #{rjs0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS1 = #{rjs1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS4 = #{rjs4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS5 = #{rjs5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS6 = #{rjs6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS7 = #{rjs7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS8 = #{rjs8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS9 = #{rjs9,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, RJS10 = #{rjs10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS11 = #{rjs11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS12 = #{rjs12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kword = #{kword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appuser = #{appuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appdate = #{appdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, truetag = #{truetag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lawlevel = #{lawlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Marked = #{marked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, anyou = #{anyou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rid = #{rid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RJS13 = #{rjs13,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, truetag_1 = #{truetag1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RJS14 = #{rjs14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJS15 = #{rjs15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where number = #{number,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select number, RJS0, RJS1, RJS4, RJS5, RJS6, RJS7, RJS8, RJS9, RJS10, RJS11, RJS12, kword, appuser, appdate, truetag, lawlevel, Marked, anyou, rid, RJS13, UpdateTime, truetag_1 , LinkSource, fjian , RJS14 ,RJS15 from main WHERE ( appuser = '${appuser}' and ifnull(truetag_1,0) <> 1)

select number, RJS0, RJS1, RJS4, RJS5, RJS6, RJS7, RJS8, RJS9, RJS10, RJS11, RJS12, kword, appuser, appdate, truetag, lawlevel, Marked, anyou, rid, RJS13, UpdateTime, truetag_1 , LinkSource, fjian from main WHERE ( appuser = '${appuser}' and ifnull(truetag_1,0) <> 1 and anyou is not null)
